product_name: Seattle Sports E-Merse Dry Case - E-Reader / iPad - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The E-Merse Dry case features a convenient slide-lock seal to help protect your iPad or e-reader from the elements. The waterproof plug-in lets you enjoy your music while your device is safely sealed.
short_description: The E-Merse Dry case features a convenient slide-lock seal to help protect your iPad or e-reader from the elements. The waterproof plug-in lets you enjoy your music while your device is safely sealed.
